biotools.summary: MiRmat is a software designed to predict mature microRNA from pri-microRNA. This tool can be divided into two parts, one is for predicting Drosha processing site, which is based on energy distribution pattern along primary microRNA’s secondary structure; the other is for predicting Dicer processing site, which is based on precursor microRNA’s structure feature

bioschemas.name: MiRmat
